description: Try our easy to follow Sticky Pork with Wokka Thin Hokkien Noodles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pork stir-fry,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Pork,Dairy free
name: Sticky Pork with Wokka Thin Hokkien Noodles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: 500g Pork rashers, remove rind & cut into 3cm pieces. Place pork in a large saucepan. Cover with cold water. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 1 minute.

Drain pork well Combine all remaining ingredients in a medium wok or saucepan. Bring to the boil on high, stirring. Reduce heat to low. Add pork and simmer very gently for about 1 hour, until very tender.
Make Wokka Noodles per pack instructions. (we only used 1 x 220g for this recipe, but if you have lots of hungry tummies you can use both)

Increase heat to medium. Simmer for 1015 minutes, stirring, until the sauce reduces to a thick syrup, remove star anise. Stir in noodles to coat with sauce and top with shallots, coriander & squeeze of lime.
